channel.title: writing on Over to you
channel.description: Recent content in writing on Over to you

item.title: New Substack publication: Scéalta na hOiche
item.description: I’ve been unemployed for over a year now, which has given me extra time to do various things. While I mostly write (extremely sporadically) about technical things that catch my fancy, I recently started a Substack publication called Scéalta na hOiche (Irish for "stories of the night"). I post there (sporadically…​) with silly bedtime stories I make up with my youngest kid. Feel free to check it out in case that’s your cup of tea!
